H0.text: The Crossbill belongs to which bird family. Sparrow

H1.text: The Crossbill belongs to which bird family. Warbler

H2.text: The Crossbill belongs to which bird family. Bunting

H3.text: The Crossbill belongs to which bird family. FINCH

A4.text: Crossbills are birds of the genus Loxia within the finch family (Fringillidae)
